resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73958</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>69bff99b-1b67-11d8-89de-f3224761ec35#1#12</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A görög kultúra</string>
            <string language="en">The Greek Culture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Griechische Kultur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Culture Grecque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Cultura Grega</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Coltura Greca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ελληνικός πολιτισμός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Cultura Griega</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A görög kultúra fontos, a városállamokat is összekapcsoló elemeinek bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">The greek culture is important, demonstration of the elements which joins the city states.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">polisz,  vallás,  mítosz,  Olümposz,  olimpia,  </string>
            <string language="en">polis,  religion,  myth,  Olümposz,  Olympics,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die griechische Kultur ist, Demonstration der 
Elemente wichtig, die die Stadtzustände verbindet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La culture grecque est importante, la 
démonstration des éléments qui joint les états de ville.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A cultura grega é importante, a demonstração 
dos elementos que junta os estados municipais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La coltura greca è importante, dimostrazione 
degli elementi che unisce la città dichiara.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ελληνικός πολιτισμός είναι σημαντικός, επίδειξη των
στοιχείων που προσχωρεί πόλεων κρατών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La cultura griega es importante, la demostración
de los elementos que ensambla los estados de ciudad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">polis, Religion, Mythus, Olümposz, Olympics,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">polis, religion, mythe, Olümposz, Jeux Olympiques,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">polis, religião, mito, Olümposz, olympics,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">polis, religione, mito, Olümposz, Olimpiadi,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">polis, θρησκεία, μύθος, Olόmposz, Ολυμπιακοί Αγώνες,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">polis, religión, mito, Olümposz, Olimpiadas,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">14-15</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:

end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
          <contribute>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:
fn:
org:Kurt Lewin Alapítvány
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
